description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation must be submitted by 2024-07-29 at 02:00PM EDT. This is the initial Request for Information (RFI) pertaining to a new and first Data Hub (data platform), proposed by the Human Capital Management Data Modernization Branch (HCMDMB), Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) aiming to introduce modern data capabilities across the Government of Canada, and improve Human Resources (HR) and Pay data collection, management and re-use practices across HR and Pay systems and organizations. The HCMDMB welcomes any interested parties with the opportunity to discuss the RFI requirements and looks forward to receiving general feedback and specific responses to questions within the RFI.
full_summary:
====================================
## **Data Hub Initiative Request for Information (RFI)**

### Solicitation Details
====================================
*   Solicitation Number: `WS4611618733`
*   Publication Date: `30 May 2024`
*   Closing Date: `29 July 2024, 14:00 EST`
*   Amendment Number: `12`
*   Expected Contract Start Date: `"None"`
*   Expected Contract End Date: `"None"`

### Tender Description
====================================
A Request for Information (RFI) has been issued by the Human Capital Management Data Modernization Branch of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) to introduce a new and first Data Hub, a data platform that aims to improve Human Resources (HR) and Pay data collection, management, and re-use practices across HR and Pay systems and organizations.

The Data Hub will provide modern data capabilities across the Government of Canada, improving HR and Pay data collection, management, and re-use practices.

### Contact Information
====================================
If interested, please submit your expression of interest, feedback, and questions in response to the RFI requirements.

*   Contact Name: `David Martyniuk (SPAC/PSPC)`
*   Contact Email: `david.martyniuk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`

### Additional Information
====================================
The RFI has been published on [Canada's Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19870606?) platform.

Note: Some details of the original text were omitted for brevity while maintaining relevance and usefulness. It is highly suggested to read the original text for complete information. 

The original poster is encouraged to thoroughly review this change to make sure that they have covered every aspect of the original document appropriately. If you identify anything that I might have missed please feel free to let me know.
